panels.title: Success

panels.description: Total amount of requests done during the time period.

targets.query:
SELECT count("counter")
FROM "locust_requests"
WHERE $timeFilter AND ("response" != '200' AND "response" != '302')

panels.title: Fail

panels.description: Total amount of requests done during the time period.
panels.title: DELETE

panels.description: Total amount of requests done during the time period.
panels.title: GET

panels.description: Total amount of requests done during the time period.
panels.title: HEAD

panels.description: Total amount of requests done during the time period.
panels.title: POST

panels.description: Total amount of requests done during the time period.
panels.title: PUT

panels.description: Number of requests per second over time.

targets.query:
SELECT "time", count("counter")
FROM "locust_requests"
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(1s), "request_type", "name"

panels.title: RPS Over Time

panels.description: Number of requests per second over time.
panels.title: Response Time Over Time

targets.query: SELECT count("response_time") as "total requests", min("response_time") as "Min (ms)", max("response_time") as "Max (ms)", mean("response_time") as "Average (ms)", percentile("response_time", 90) as "90%ile (ms)",  percentile("response_time", 95) as "95%ile (ms)"  FROM "locust_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "name", "request_type"

SELECT count("counter")
FROM "locust_requests"
WHERE $timeFilter AND exception <> 'None'
GROUP BY "request_type", "name", "exception"
